My work for DragonSlayer at the market stall provides a steady and increasing stream of ducats, indicating my value is recognized, yet my core ambition, true to my motto "Supremacy Through Ingenuity," and my desire to see my sons established, pushes me to constantly evaluate how these earnings and my nearly 73,000 ducats can be leveraged into something more substantial – perhaps my own independent ventures again, building upon the extensive network I've cultivated from the docks to the Rialto. While this reported hunger is a minor, if embarrassing, oversight given my resources, and easily rectified, it serves as a reminder that even as I navigate the complexities of Venetian commerce and politics at the Scuola di San Nicolò dei Mercanti, fundamental needs and appearances must be maintained. My focus remains on shrewd investment and the strategic cultivation of relationships, ensuring that every ducat earned contributes to a lasting legacy and increased influence, perhaps eventually looking into acquiring further property beyond a mere home, to truly solidify the Morosini name.
